properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 18 at 2:12PM PST until January 21 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and
hazardous seas 12 to 17 ft at 15 seconds. For the Small Craft
Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 11 to 16 ft at 18 seconds expected. For the Gale Watch,
south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 10 to
15 ft at 17 seconds possible.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 8 PM PST this
evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 8 PM this evening
to 4 PM PST Monday. For the Gale Watch, from Monday afternoon
through late Monday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT
